title: Hey i got wrongly temp baned can someone check to clarify?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hey my account MercuryHatter got baned a feew days ago and was like "ok" since i know that i can be quite abusive from time to time but one of my freinds recently asked me how i got baned and i said cause i was salty. he then reminded me i havent been that salty. so i looked into it and the two games i was reported in was from feeding, one of those games i was clearly vsing a smerf tryndamere if you check his match history hes got an 83% winrate and was in gold. the seccond i was getting camped and trolled by my team at the start then still managed to hold on and ended up with the most kills anyway. can someone pls look into this and get me un temp baned, or atleast have the people that baned me added to the ban spam list. cheers
 sorry other link is here https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/247311767/4250436?tab=overview

replies.body:
The part of the system that handles gameplay offences (intent feeding falls under that umbrella) is typically more cautious in its actions. As a result, gameplay punishments are typically slower than chat ones, but the false positive rate is tiny. That's not to say it's impossible, but without watching the replays I'm not going to say anything with any degree of certainty as match history alone can often be misleading.

If you feel you were unduly punished, I'd recommend you submit a ticket to player support to appeal the restriction: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

There is a high volume of tickets at the moment, so you'll have to be a bit patient.
Cheers, but if your busy atm i probbaly wont be unbaned util maybe aday before anyways XD ty tho and good luck
Yes but if it's a false punishment then you don't want it to affect things like your honour and your history going forward.
